ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item allows you to teleport to any allied structure while Rooted in place. This effect is not interrupted by damage but is interrupted by hard Crowd Control. Cooldown - 160s.

ShortDesc: Teleport to an allied structure. Not interrupted by damage.

ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: This item can be upgraded from anywhere and replaces Boots for Ratatoskr.
PASSIVE: When Ratatoskr deals damage with an ability he restores 3% of his Maximum Health.
PASSIVE: Dart deals 35% increased damage and can Critically Strike. When Dart damages an enemy Ratatoskr gains 20% Physical Lifesteal and 20% Basic Attack damage for 6s.
PASSIVE: Enemies hit by Acorn Blast are debuffed, taking 5% additional damage from Ratatoskr's abilities, stacking up to 3 times. Acorn Blast now fires 5 Acorns.
PASSIVE: When Ratatoskr deals damage to an enemy god with an ability he restores 7% of his Maximum Health and Mana.

ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE: When Ratatoskr deals damage with an ability he restores 3% of his Maximum Health. Flurry now provides protections equal to the protections shred from enemy gods. Flurry gains an additional charge.
PASSIVE - Enemies hit by your damaging Abilities take an additional 20 Physical Damage over 2s. (Max 2 Stacks) Can be upgraded at level 20.
PASSIVE - Enemies hit by your damaging abilities take an additional 50 (+7.5% of their Current Health) as Physical Damage over 2s. (Max 2 Stacks)

ItemDescription.Description: Corrupt your opponents to gain power.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Enemies hit by your damaging Abilities are corrupted, taking 75 Physical Damage over 5s and reducing their Attack Speed by 10%. (Max 2 Stacks). Each time you apply corruption you gain 10% Attack Speed and 4% increased Protections for 6s, up to a maximum of 5 stacks.

ShortDesc: Corrupt your opponents to gain Attack Speed.

ItemDescription.Description: Basic Attack restore the wielder.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Hitting an enemy with a Basic Attack restores 2 Health (+0.4% of your Maximum Health) and 1 Mana (+1% of your Maximum Mana). Basic Attacks that deal damage in an AoE restore less health (75% for Melee Attacks, 50% for Ranged Attacks) for each enemy hit after the first. Can be upgraded at level 20.

ItemDescription.Description: This item gives the owner additional Health every time they hit with a Basic Attack.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Hitting an enemy with a Basic Attack restores 2% of your Health and Mana. Basic Attacks that deal damage in an AoE restore less health (75% for Melee Attacks, 50% for Ranged Attacks) for each enemy hit after the first. Can be upgraded at level 20.

ShortDesc: Basic Attacks restore more Health and Mana.

ItemDescription.Description: Bonus Attack Power on Kill
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - When an enemy dies within 80 units of you gain 1 stack of Temper that provides 3.5% increased Basic Attack Damage for 10s. This can stack up to 10 times. If an enemy god dies near you immediately gain 5 stacks.

ItemDescription.Description: Mark a minion as your bounty.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Every 10s the highest health enemy minion or jungle monster within 80 units of you is marked. If you secure the killing blow on that target you gain 3 bonus gold and 20% attack speed for 8s, and restore 20 Mana. Can be upgraded at level 20.

ShortDesc: Mark a minion as your bounty.

ItemDescription.Description: Defeating enemies provides gold and attack speed.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - When you kill an enemy you gain 7 gold and 20% Attack Speed for 8s. This can stack up to 3 times. If you kill an enemy god you gain 3 stacks and 21 gold immediately.

ShortDesc: Defeating enemies provides gold and attack speed.

ItemDescription.Description: Accrue gold, allowing your horde of treasure to empower you.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - All sources of gold gain are increased by 5%. For every 100 gold you have gain 1.25% Attack Speed and 1% Physical Critical Strike Chance, up to a maximum of 20 stacks.

ShortDesc: Accrue gold, allowing your horde of treasure to empower you

ItemDescription.Description: This starter item steals life while fighting.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Damaging an enemy god steals 20 health (+1.5 per level) away from your target and restores 20 mana. This effect can only occur once every 10s. Can be upgraded at level 20.

ItemDescription.Description: This starter item steals life while fighting.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Damaging an enemy god steals 2% (+2% of your Protection from items) of their Current Health away from your target and restores it to you. This effect can only occur once every 10s.

ItemDescription.Description: Shield your CC'd allies.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - When an ally god within 55 units of you is hit by a hard crowd control effect, give them a shield equal to 15% of your Maximum Health. This effect can only occur once every 8s.

ItemDescription.Description: This item burns and slows enemies.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Enemies hit by your Basic Attacks are burned, taking 16 Physical Damage (+5% of your Physical and Magical Power) over 2s and have their Attack Speed reduced by 4.5%. Jungle Monsters take 4x the amount of damage and restore 3% Health and 5% Mana when they die if they are burned. This effect can stack up to 3 times. Can be upgraded at level 20.

ShortDesc: Basic attack hits burn enemies. Jungle Monsters take extra damage.

ItemDescription.Description: This item burns and slows enemies.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Enemies hit by your Basic Attacks are burned, taking 60 physical damage over 2s and have their Attack Speed slowed by 10%. Jungle Monsters and Bosses take 4x damage and restore 3% Health and 5% Mana when they die if they are burned. This effect can stack up to 4 times.

ShortDesc: Basic attack burn enemies. Jungle Monsters take extra damage.

ItemDescription.Description: Attack first for massive damage.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - If you have not taken or dealt damage in the last 5s and hit an enemy god, Jungle Monster, or Jungle Boss, they immediately take 20% of their Current Health as Physical Damage and are slowed by 20% for 5s.

ItemDescription.Description: Gives users Gold and Mana for killing Jungle monsters.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Your Basic Attacks deal +25 True Damage and your Abilities deal +35% Damage versus Jungle Monsters. When a Jungle Monster is killed you are restored for 10% of the Monster's Health and 25 Mana. Can be upgraded at level 20.

ItemDescription.Description: Jungles and Objective fall before you.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Your Basic Attacks deal +50 True Damage and your Abilities deal +35% damage against Jungle Camps, Structures, and Jungle Bosses. When any of these die you gain a 10% power buff for 30s and are healed for 10% of their Health, 10% of your Mana.

ShortDesc: Jungle Monsters and Objectives take massive damage from you.

ItemDescription.Description: Weave between Basic Attacks and abilities.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - After casting an ability your next Basic Attack deals an additional 80 True Damage. After hitting a Basic Attack empowered by Bumba’s Hammer, your active cooldowns are reduced by 1s and you are healed for 5% of your Maximum Health.

ItemDescription.Description: Cooldown Reduction and MP5
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - This item grants 2 MP5 per 10% of your missing Mana. Your damaging abilities deal an extra 15 true damage to minions. Can be upgraded at level 20.

ItemDescription.Description: This starting item reduces your cooldowns when you are hit by a Physical God
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - This item grants 4 MP5 per 10% of your missing Mana. This item grants 10 Magical power per 10% of your available Mana.

ShortDesc: More power the higher your Mana pool is.

ItemDescription.Description: Jump to an alternate timeline upon death.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - When you would die you instead find a timeline you are still alive, becoming CC Immune, Damage Immune, and unable to act. After 1.75s you are restored to 25% Health and Mana and can act again. This can only occur once every 6 minutes.

ShortDesc: Jump to an alternate timeline upon death.

ItemDescription.Description: This starting item is for Magical users and gives them a chance to gain Health and Mana.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Damaging any enemy with an ability restores 4 health and 6 mana. Can only trigger once per target per ability. Can be upgraded at level 20.

ItemDescription.Description: This starting item is for Magical users and gives them a chance to gain Health and Mana.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Damaging any enemy with an ability restores 1.5% Health and Mana. Can only trigger once per target per ability.

ShortDesc: Bonus Sustain and Lifesteal for hitting Abilities

ItemDescription.Description: Bonus damage, costs health.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Your abilities deal 15% more damage, but cost 5% of your Maximum Health. If the cost would kill you, you instead don't pay the cost.

ShortDesc: Abilities do more damage...for a price.

ItemDescription.Description: Assist provide health, mana, and gold.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Getting the assist for an enemy minion or jungle monster dying will provide 7 Bonus gold and restore 12 Health and 8 Mana. If you are not within 30 units of an allied god for 20 seconds this passive is disabled until you are near an allied god again. Can be upgraded at level 17.

ShortDesc: Assists provide health, mana, and gold.

ItemDescription.Description: Gain more health, mana, and gold!
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Getting the assist when an enemy dies provides 15 Bonus Gold and restores 4% of your Health and Mana.

ShortDesc: Gain more health, mana, and gold!

ItemDescription.Description: Share protections with nearby allies.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: AURA - Evenly split 80 Physical and Magical Protection among all allied gods within 55 units and yourself. If you are alone you only gain 40 Physical and Magical Protections.

ItemDescription.Description: Be benevolent and restore your allies!
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - While not near an ally god you gain 1 stack of Benevolence every second, up to a maximum of 50. Assists provide 4 stacks. While within 70 units of a hurt ally god you use up to 5 stacks a second to heal them and yourself for 0.75% of your Maximum Health. Each stack consumed provide you with 1 gold. If you overcap stacks they will still provide gold as long as you are near an ally god. Can be upgraded at level 17.

ItemDescription.Description: Protect your allies from harm at a cost.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: AURA - You gain 8 GP5. Damage taken by allied gods within 70 units of you is reduced by 15%, up to a maximum of 100 damage. The reduced damage is redirected to you as Magical Damage. If you would die from this damage it does not get reduced or redirected.

ItemDescription.Description: Turn your defense into offense.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Your Basic Attacks deal bonus damage equal to 3% of your Maximum Health as Magical Damage to enemies and structures.

ItemDescription.Description: Hit an enemy to reduce their healing taken.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Enemy Gods that you hit have their healing taken reduced by 15% for 6s. You are healed for 100% of the healing reduced. Can be upgraded at level 20.

ItemDescription.Description: Siphon healing from enemies your have hit.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Enemy Gods that you hit have their healing taken reduced by 30% for 6s. You are healed for 100% of the healing reduced.

ShortDesc: Siphon healing from enemies your have hit.

ItemDescription.Description: Hit an enemy to reduce their healing taken.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Enemy gods that you hit have their healing taken reduced by 50% for 8s.

ItemDescription.Description: Stalk alone, fight together.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - While you are within 55 units of an allied god you gain 10% Attack Speed. If you are alone you instead gain 5% Movement Speed. Can be upgraded at level 20.

ItemDescription.Description: Stalk alone, fight with allies to empower them.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: AURA - While you are within 55 units of an allied god you gain 20% Attack Speed Aura. If you are alone you instead gain 10% Movement Speed.

ItemDescription.Description: Move together. Fight together. Isolate your enemies.

ItemDescription.Description: Focus your power and release it.

Also deals an additional 2 true damage per stack to minions. This effect stacks up to 20 times. Can be upgraded at level 20.

ItemDescription.Description: Charge up power to release a devastating attack.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Every 1s you gain a stack of Demise, causing your next damaging ability that hits an enemy god deals an additional 1% of your Magical Power in damage and remove all stacks. This effect stacks up to 20 times.

ItemDescription.Description: Cast continuously, do not break your focus.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Every time you cast an ability that costs mana you gain a stack of Focus for 10s, providing 3% Movement Speed, 3% Damage Increase, and 2% Damage Taken Reduction, stacking up to 3 times.

ItemDescription.Description: Steal enemy monsters away and gain new sight.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - You deal 30% increased damage to Jungle Monsters. Upon defeating a Large Jungle Monster you place a ward at its location that lasts for 30 seconds. While in the jungle you gain +20 HP5 and +15 MP5 Can be upgraded at level 20.

ItemDescription.Description: Gain the sight to see what is hidden.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - You deal 35% increased damage to Jungle Monsters and Jungle Bosses. Upon defeating a Large Jungle Monster or Jungle Boss, you gain the ability to see wards for 30s.

ShortDesc: Gain the sight to see what is hidden.

ItemDescription.Description: Guard the jungle to gain immense power.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - While in the jungle you gain 15% Power and 12% Protections.

ShortDesc: Guard the jungle to gain immense power.

ItemDescription.Description: Ward off enemy abilities to gain protection.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - When you are hit by an ability you gain a stack of Dampening, gaining 5 Protections for 5s. This occurs only once per ability cast. This can stack twice. Can be upgraded at level 20.

ItemDescription.Description: Stalwart against abilities.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - You gain 5% Damage Mitigation. Whenever you are hit by an ability you gain a stack of Rebuke, providing an additional 4% Damage Mitigation for 8s. This occurs only once per ability cast. This can stack up to three times.

ItemDescription.Description: Absorb attacks to generate an explosion.

ItemDescription.Description: This starter item restores its user's Health and Mana when in assist range of a slain minion.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Getting an assist when an enemy dies provides a stack that gives 1% Movement Speed and 2% Attack Speed for 8s to nearby allies up to 10 stacks. When you've gained 3 or more stacks from assists, once per ability, each time you damage an enemy god you restore 15 Health and Mana to nearby allies within 55 units and gain 10 gold. Can be upgraded at level 17.

ItemDescription.Description: Mark an area for attack! Charge!
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - When you damage an enemy god you call down a Spartan Flag at your location, providing 10% increased Power to allies standing in the radius. Lasts for 10s, can only occur once every 10s.

ItemDescription.Description: This starter item restores its user's Health and Mana when in assist range of a slain minion.

ItemDescription.Description: Using this item grants the owner invulnerability for a short duration.

At the end of the invulnerability, you explode dealing 100 + 50% of the Prevented Damage as Magical Damage in a 30 unit radius. The damage dealt by this effect is capped at 20% of the enemies' Maximum Health. Cooldown - 140s.

ItemDescription.Description: Using this item grants the owner invulnerability for a short duration.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item makes you invulnerable to damage and healing for 1.5s, and prevents you from taking any actions. You may still move. Each instance of damage prevented in this time provides you 7% Movement Speed for 4s, stacking up to 3 times. Cooldown - 140s.

ItemDescription.Description: Ally damage buff.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item grants all allied gods within 70 units 20% Increased Damage dealt to all targets, including objectives, and 40% Attack Speed increase, decaying every 0.5s for 6 seconds. Cooldown - 110s.

ItemDescription.Description: Ally damage buff.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item grants all allied gods within 70 units 10% Increased Damage dealt to all targets, including objectives, and 25% Attack Speed increase for 8 seconds. If you gain a kill or assist on an Enemy God while this buff is active, the duration refreshes. This can only occur once per use. Cooldown - 110s.

ItemDescription.Description: Short range teleport.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item will allow you to teleport up to 45 units away instantly, leaving behind a trail of wildfire that burns Enemies that pass through it for 20 (+ 4 per level) True Damage every 0.5s for the next 4s. Enemies are damaged for 1s after leaving the flames. This item can not be used if you have taken or dealt damage in the last 3s. Cooldown - 120s.

ItemDescription.Description: Short range teleport.

On teleporting, slow all enemies’ Movement Speed and Attack Speed by 15% within a 25 unit radius for 2.5s. Cooldown - 120s.

ItemDescription.Description: Provides vision and warmth to allies.

If destroyed the cooldown of the relic is reduced by 20s. On use, a light sprite appears that patrols back and forth on a 80 unit line, revealing enemies along the way. Cooldown - 90s.

ItemDescription.Description: Provides vision and warmth to allies.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Place a radiant glow at a target location for 90s. Allies who move through this field gain 15% increased Power and 20% Movement Speed for 8s. This fragment acts as a Sentry Ward. If destroyed the cooldown of the relic is reduced by 20s. Cooldown - 100s.

ItemDescription.Description: Reduces enemy Healing.

Enemies that are healed by god abilities while affected by this curse cause a pool of miasma to form beneath them that persists for 6s. The miasma deals 2% of the enemy's Current Health every 0.5s while enemies are inside it and refreshes the Ankh debuff effect. Cooldown - 100s.

ItemDescription.Description: Reduces enemy Healing.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item reduces the Healing received by all enemy gods within 55 units by 60% for 10s and removes 75% of any currently applied shield. Enemies that are healed by god abilities while affected by this curse take 20% more damage from all sources for the duration of the curse. All healing reduced by this effect is instead distributed to your allies in a 40 unit radius around you. Cooldown - 100s.

ItemDescription.Description: Increases ally Movement Speed
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item increases the Movement Speed of allied gods within 55 units by 20% for 5s and makes them immune to Slows. On use, this Relic also Roots Enemies in the area for 1s. Cooldown - 110s

ItemDescription.Description: Increases ally Movement Speed

For the duration, successful basic attacks increase the duration by 1s up to an additional 4s.  Cooldown - 110s

ItemDescription.Description: Reduces enemy gods Attack Speed and Movement Speed.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item Slows the Movement Speed of all enemy gods within 35 units by 30% for 5s. Their Attack Speed is reduced by 25% for the duration. Additionally, their Damage Dealt is reduced by 15%. If an enemy deals 10% of an Allied God's Maximum Health within the duration, the debuff's effects are increased by 10% each, stacking up to 3 times. Cooldown - 110s.

ItemDescription.Description: Reduces enemy gods Attack Speed and Movement Speed.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item Slows the Movement Speed of all enemy gods within 35 units by 30% for 5s. Their Attack Speed is reduced by 25% for the duration. Additionally, their Damage Dealt is reduced by 15%. If an enemy is dealt 30% of their max. HP during this duration, they are trembled for 1.5s. Cooldown - 110s.

When the shield is broken or expires, Allied Gods gain a new buff providing 15% Damage Mitigation and 20% Movement Speed for 3s. Cooldown - 130s.

ItemDescription.Description: Protections and Damage Mitigation Buff.

Additionally, all allies take 40% reduced damage from Basic Attacks while the shield is active. Using this item also allows you and allied gods to pass through players and player made objects. Cooldown - 130s.

ItemDescription.Description: Mana and Health restoration.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item causes you to Enter a meditative state where nearby allies gods within 35 units restore 10 + 3% of their missing health and mana each pulse. You also gain a protective barrier of wind that explodes if an enemy comes within 15 units, knocking them back. Pulses occur once every second for 4s. Cooldown - 130s.

ItemDescription.Description: Mana and Health restoration.

Additionally each pulse reduces cooldowns for all abilities by 1.5s. Pulses occur once every second for 4s. Cooldown - 130s.

ShortDesc: Mana and health restoration with cooldown reduction.

ItemDescription.Description: Removes Crowd Control Effects.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item removes Crowd Control Effects and makes you immune to new ones for 2s. Any Hard Crowd Control Effect that is cleansed during this time, including on activation, sends out a homing projectile to the Enemy who applied it, dealing 7% of their Current Health as Magical Damage. Cooldown - 140s.

ItemDescription.Description: Removes Crowd Control Effects.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item removes Crowd Control Effects and makes you immune to new ones for 2s. Additionally, your active cooldowns are reduced by 3s on use. Cooldown - 140s.

ItemDescription.Description: Upon activation you reflect 30% of all damage you take for the next 5s back to its owner.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item reflects 25% of all damage you take, before mitigations, for the next 5 seconds, back to its owner as Magical Damage. If you are dealt 120 * your level damage while this effect is active, the effect will end early. While this is active enemies can only lifesteal from you for 50% of their total lifesteal. Additionally, you gain a stack of 5% Movement Speed and Attack Speed for all Enemy Gods within a 55 unit radius. Cooldown - 120s.

ItemDescription.Description: Upon activation you reflect 35% of all damage you take for the next 3s back to its owner.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item reflects 35% of all damage you take, before mitigations, for the next 3 seconds, back to its owner as Magical Damage. If you are dealt 120 * your level damage while this effect is active, the effect will end early. While this is active enemies can only lifesteal from you for 75% of their total lifesteal. Each basic attack from enemy gods reduces the cooldown of this item by 0.5s. Cooldown - 80s.

ItemDescription.Description: Fires True Damage Projectile.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Fire a bolt that travels 70 units, stopping on the first Enemy God hit and splashing in a 20 unit radius, dealing 15% of their Current Health as True Damage and reducing any active shields by 75%. Targets hit take 5% increased damage for 5s, stacking 2 times. This relic has 2 charges. Cooldown - 110s.

ItemDescription.Description: Fires True Damage Projectile.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Fire a bolt that travels 50 units, stopping on first god hit, reducing any active shields by 75%, and linking them to you. For the next 4s, they are dealt 5% of their Current Health as True Damage every second, and you receive half that amount as healing. Enemies can break the link if they move 60 units away from you. This relic has 2 charges. A second hit on the same target will just refresh the duration. Cooldown - 110s.

ShortDesc: Fires a projectile that steals health from enemy gods

ItemDescription.Description: Teleport to an allied structure. Not interrupted by damage.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item allows you to teleport to any allied structure or ward while Rooted in place. This effect is not interrupted by damage but is interrupted by hard Crowd Control. Kills and assists on enemy gods reduces the cooldown by 10s. Cooldown - 110s.

ShortDesc: Teleport cooldown reduced by kills and assists

ItemDescription.Description: Teleport to an allied structure. Not interrupted by damage.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item allows you to teleport to any allied structure or ward while Rooted in place. This effect is not interrupted by damage but is interrupted by hard Crowd Control. After teleporting you gain slow immunity, 20% Movement Speed and 40 Protections for 10s. Cooldown - 130s.
